## ComponentStore class

Responsible for providing read and write access to a local state within its provider scope.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ComponentStore<TState> extends StoreBase<TState> 
```
<b>Extends:</b> StoreBase&lt;TState&gt;
